Serialized Form

  • Package tetris.panels

    • Class tetris.panels.BigPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • begin

          javax.swing.JButton begin
          Facilitates the transition from introduction panels to game panels

        • block

          BlockPanel block
          JPanel which shows the upcoming blocks in the game

        • center

          javax.swing.JPanel center
          Formatting JPanel

        • left

          leftPanel left
          Decoration JPanels

        • myFrame

          javax.swing.JFrame myFrame
          JFrame to be displayed onto

        • nextBlocks

          Block[] nextBlocks
          Stores the next 5 blocks

        • right

          leftPanel right
          Decoration JPanels

        • s

          javax.swing.Timer s
          Called every 5 milliseconds to check if the next 5 blocks have changed

        • score

          ScorePanel score
          JPanel which shows the highscore, current score, and provides functionality for saving and loading games from .txt file

        • t

          javax.swing.Timer t
          Calls the start() method which changes the introduction over to the game

        • tetris

          TetrisPanel tetris
          JPanel for the actual tetris game

        • title

          javax.swing.JLabel title
          Displays the title logo

    • Class tetris.panels.TetrisPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blockCount

          int blockCount
          Stores the current index of blocks

        • blockPanel

          BlockPanel blockPanel

        • blocks

          java.util.ArrayList<Block> blocks
          ArrayLists of blocks. blocks stores random blocks, kblocks stores constant blocks

        • gameboard

          boolean[][] gameboard
          Stores the full and empty spots in the game

        • k

          BlockTimer k
          Timer to control a Keeper class which draws all the constant blocks

        • kblocks

          java.util.ArrayList<Block> kblocks
          ArrayList of constant blocks. These blocks are in the finished state

        • keep

          TetrisPanel.Keeper keep
          AddingListener class for drawing constant objects
          See Also:
          AddingListener

        • l

          javax.swing.Timer l
          Timer object to control ActionListener Listener
